ygData.subject: RE: Rubicite list
ygData.msgSnippet: Methinks that he has been placed back inside the Library. For a while he was in the front room in front of that painting. Now he is probably back aside the
ygData.messageBody:
Methinks that he has been placed back inside the Library. For a while he
was in the front room in front of that painting. Now he is probably back
aside the enchanter vendor.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Rebecca Small [mailto:macha_nabaob@...]
8)Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 9:52 AM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: [eqbards] Rubicite list
8)
8)
8)From: "Rebecca Small" <macha_nabaob@...>
8)
8)Hail Good Bards,
8)Someone put out a neat list of which Tae dropped which piece
8)of rubicite.
8)This topic came up yesterday and even though I thought I had
8)saved that
8)note, I can not seem to find it. Can someone send that back
8)to me? I have
8)gone for the skald type bard in role play and am now heavily
8)relied upon for
8)information like this. I can't believe I lost it!
8)I finally started working up piercing and it's definitely
8)going to take
8)awhile to raise it, probably because it is equipped
8)secondary. Just started
8)in the courtyard of Cazi, amazing lag and spam there!
8)Has anyone noticed the song vendor in HH having been moved? I
8)went to get
8)song 23 last night and he was gone. I didn't have time for a
8)full scale
8)search.
8)
8)May you live in interesting times,
8)Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
8)L23 on Xegony
8)
